content: **eramyst square** this pattern is available in english pattern is written using u s terminology the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2022/08/eramyst-square html this textured square has 17 rounds and measures about 4 1/2 **materials needed** * size 10 crochet thread in 2 colors- color 1- 50-75 yards color 2- 15-20 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * sciccors **special stitches** * 3-fpdc popcorn * 2-fpdc cluster * 2-double_crochet cluster * 3-double_crochet cluster * 3-treble_crochet cluster * 5-double_crochet popcorn * picot * large picot
